titles.title: A bill to exclude Agent Orange settlement payments from countable income and resources under Federal mean-tested programs.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.
Committee on Veterans requested executive comment from VA, OMB, Health and Human Services Department, Agriculture Department.

bill.summary: 7/29/1988--Introduced. Excludes Agent Orange settlement payments from income or resources in determining eligibility for benefits under any Federal or federally assisted program.
